item.description:
@demonlover14 wrote:

mich702703:

yea i know but im figuring out be my self what the fuck it all means… i think the best thing u still can do is just try an other client… its the simplest way

I’ve non stopped worked on my client for a few months now. . .
That’s 2 much work to throw away…
I’m just fine with the colors I got now then.

Read full topic

@demonlover14 wrote:

[quote=“mich702703, post:14, topic:338007”]ok are u using ur own client or a other client like moparscape or silab soft… cause if thats the case… ur problem is client sided iv got the same problem when im using other clients… (all colored text= black text then…)

the color codes are normaly coded in ur Client’s client.java[/quote]
I’ve serached @whi@ in client.java in my Client, and how does this make me find all the codes for all the colors I can use?

item.dc:creator: @demonlover14 demonlover14
item.description:
@demonlover14 wrote:

[quote=“mich702703, post:8, topic:338007”]how do i explain… ok so u have ur map with ur source in and at the right top u have the Search thingy… type @ora@ in there and if there are results open then 1 by 1… (use notepad) in notepad u can search 2 so search in the file u opend @ora@ agien.

btw il look in my server2 for an other answer that may help beter (ps post something in my VPS help thingy so it wil bump plz :p[/quote]
I don’t understand what your talking about, what file do I search?

Read full topic

@demonlover14 wrote:

[quote=“mich702703, post:4, topic:338007”][quote author=demonlover14 link=topic=434405.msg3189814#msg3189814 date=1272141553]

@yel@tekst@yel@ = yellow
@ora@tekst@ora@ = orange
@gre@tekst@gre@ = green
@red@tekst@red@ = red

Thank’s, I knew how they were wrote but I didn’t know their was some of those colors:)

[/quote]
bwaa no prob…
btw do u know my problem with VPS??:p[/quote]
I don’t do VPS, and btw the ora once makes the text black, help?

item.description:
@demonlover14 wrote:

~Problem Solved~
If you need this help here are the colors;
Text colors;
@cya@text@cya@
@whi@text@whi@
@yel@text@yel@
@ora@text@ora@
@gre@text@gre@
@red@text@red@
